info:
The project will provide sustainable provision of safe water in Binh Duong Province, Dak Lak Province, Da Nang City, Hai Phong City, Thua Thien Hue Province, Quang Tri Province. The Project will also improve efficiency of participating water supply companies.
Project Outputs: Increased coverage to 90% by 2020. Improved business planning, asset and financial management. NRW Reduced.
name: MFF:WATER SECTOR INVESTMENT PROGRAM-TRANCHE 2
